code:
import turtle

t1 = turtle.Turtle()
t1.pencolor('white')


t1.forward(100)
t1.backward(100)

t1.forward(-100)
t1.backward(-100)

guide.img: The forward command moves the turtle object forward by the number of pixels we give inside the parentheses. In this case, we are asking our turtle to move forward by 100 pixels
